name: @videobrew/editor
description: Preview videos created using any web technologies. Requires @videobrew/cli to be installed globally.
author: Luttje

scripts.serve-test-video-app: ws --hostname localhost --port 8088 --directory ../examples/0-dependencies --stack lws-body-parser lws-request-monitor lws-log lws-cors lws-json lws-compress lws-rewrite lws-blacklist lws-conditional-get lws-mime lws-range lws-spa ../common/mw-cors.mjs lws-static lws-index
scripts.postbuild: cp package*.json dist && cd dist && npm ci --omit=dev
